name: Pop-up Blocker
description:
A game about absolutely destroying computer pop-ups, hopefully you find it fun and don't lose your mind as much as I did making it!

Fun fact: In the main menu, you can drag the play button and pop the bubbles on the side!

If you are experiencing lag on the web build, try turning hardware acceleration on, or  downloading the desktop build.

Also, now I realize after submitting the game to the jam this overlay blocks the top right corner of the gameplay screen >:( Either resize your browser window until it goes away, or download the desktop build.

itch.io is evil what is the point of having this be sticky

Source code: https://github.com/Epicgamer2469/HaxeJam2022
